properties.displayName: New BgInfo.EXE Custom VBScript Registry Configuration
properties.query:
DeviceRegistryEvents
| where RegistryValueData startswith "4" and ActionType =~ "RegistryValueSet" and RegistryKey contains "\\Software\\Winternals\\BGInfo\\UserFields"

tags.name: description
tags.value: Detects setting of a new registry value related to BgInfo configuration, which can be abused to execute custom VBScript via "BgInfo.exe"
